clinical_study.brief_title: Multi-center Clinical Observation of a New Treatment Method Based on the Pathogenesis of Obstructive Prostatitis
clinical_study.official_title: Multi-center Clinical Observation of a New Treatment Method Based on the Pathogenesis of Obstructive Prostatitis

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

collaborator.agency: Xin Hua Hospital of Zhejiang Province
Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine
The First Affiliated Hospital of Shanxi Medical University
The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University
First Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-Sen University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: Multi-center clinical observation of a new treatment method based on the pathogenesis of obstructive prostatitis

detailed_description.textblock:
1. Study purpose: To investigate the therapeutic effect of transurethral dilation of prostate with a columnar balloon on patients with chronic obstructive prostatitis
2. Study design: A randomized, controlled, multi-center clinical trial
3. Study subjects: Patients with chronic obstructive prostatitis
4. Number of subjects: 180
5. Surgery treatments:
Test group: Patients will receive a surgery: transurethral dilation of prostate with a columnar balloon.
Control group: Patients will receive a surgery: transurethral incision of bladder neck.

primary_outcome.description: measure the chronic prostatitis symptom index (CPSI) by a questionnaire

arm_group.description: Test group: Patients will receive a surgery: transurethral dilation of prostate with a columnar balloon
Control group: Patients will receive a surgery: transurethral incision of bladder neck.

intervention.description: a surgery: transurethral dilation of prostate with a columnar balloon
a surgery: transurethral incision of bladder neck

facility.name: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University
